name: Ethyne Rush
description:
Ethyne Rush is a fast-paced, first-person platformer inspired by parkour games. Gain speed by wall jumping, sliding on slopes, and generate structures around you to help you reach new heights in this abstract, recursive environment.

The game has no precise goal - it's all about combining your different abilities to never stop moving, reach ludicrous speeds and create paths to reach any spot on the map. Your sessions will be accompanied by hypnotic visual effects and an intense techno soundtrack that will evolve as your speed changes.

Controls ActionGamePadKeyboard/MouseMoveLeft joystickWASDLookRight joystickMouse mouvementJumpCrossSpacebarSlideCircleCtrlSpawn wall to the leftL1Mouse left clickSpawn wall to the rightR1Mouse right clickSpawn downward slopeR2ESpawn upward slopeL2QPauseStartEsc The Team
